start.text: You wake up. Your beans are gone. The jar is empty. A single bean shell lies on the floor.

choices.label: Call the Bureau of Legumes & Lost Goods

neighborDoor.text: You knock on your neighbor’s door. They open it just a crack. Their eyes dart around nervously.

choices.label: Offer them a granola bar as a bribe

accuseNeighbor.text: You point dramatically. 'YOU stole my beans!' Your neighbor gasps. 'I would NEVER! But... I did see someone lurking around your house last night.'

choices.label: Throw a piece of bread at them (why not?)

neighborSaw.text: 'It was... a raccoon. But not a normal one. This one wore a tiny bandana.'

raccoonLore.text: Your neighbor whispers, 'They call him... The Bean Bandit. Leader of the Raccoon Syndicate.'

pretendBrave.text: You puff out your chest. 'I fear no raccoon.' Your neighbor nods politely, clearly unconvinced.

choices.label: Go home and rethink your life

stormOff.text: You storm off, but trip over a garden gnome. The neighbor watches silently.

choices.label: Lie on the ground and give up

breadFight.text: Your neighbor stares at you. 'What was that for? You wanna fight me?'

choices.label: Throw another piece of bread at your neighbor
Apologize and give him a granola bar

bribeNeighbor.text: You offer a granola bar. Your neighbor snatches it instantly. 'Okay fine, I DID see something. A trail of beans leading into the woods.'

choices.label: Ask why they’re so obsessed with granola bars

granolaLore.text: 'I haven't eaten real food in days,' they whisper. 'The raccoons... they took everything.'

teamUp.text: Your neighbor grabs a broom. 'Let’s get your beans back.'

backyardSneak.text: You sneak into their backyard. You find... a half‑eaten can of beans. Suspicious.

confrontBackyard.text: Your neighbor panics. 'Okay fine! I stole ONE bean. But the rest? The raccoons took them!'

tasteBeans.text: You taste the beans. They are... raccoon‑flavored. You immediately regret everything.

forestPath.text: You follow the bean shells into the woods. Strange chittering echoes around you.

choices.label: Follow a strange glowing crack in the air
Talk to the mysterious old man playing chess
Look at that weird stool thingy which looks mysterious
Inspect the weird stool more closely

raccoonEncounter.text: A raccoon wearing a tiny bandana steps out. 'So... you’ve come for your beans.'

choices.label: Ask the raccoon to wait for a minute and study ancient bean magic
Pause and meditate with the raccoon

raccoonEncounterTeam.text: You and your neighbor burst into the clearing. The raccoon bandit sighs. 'Two of you? Really?'

neighborFight.text: Your neighbor charges with the broom. The raccoon sidesteps effortlessly. 'Pathetic,' it mutters.

negotiateRaccoon.text: You sit down. The raccoon sits too. 'Your beans were delicious,' it admits. 'But perhaps we can strike a deal.'

tradeOffer.text: 'Bring me three granola bars,' the raccoon says. 'Then we talk.'

demandBeans.text: You demand your beans back. The raccoon laughs. 'Bold. I respect that.' It returns half the beans.

fightRaccoon.text: You charge. The raccoon charges. It’s dramatic. It’s chaotic. It’s... surprisingly adorable.

choices.label: Hesitate to realize that you are fighting a raccoon over beans instead of getting a job, getting married, or doing something better in life, until the raccoon punches you.

fightLose.text: The raccoon chitters triumphantly as you collapse onto the grass. Before you can get back up, he grabs your precious beans, stuffs them into a tiny backpack, and scurries off into the shadows.

followPawprints.text: You follow a trail of tiny pawprints leading toward the old park. They stop near a suspicious-looking trash can.

searchNeighborhood.text: You scan the neighborhood. A scrap of fabric from the raccoon's tiny backpack is stuck on a fence.

trashCan.text: You peek inside the trash can. Two glowing raccoon eyes stare back. You close the lid immediately.

parkSearch.text: You search the park and find a tiny raccoon-sized footprint leading into a storm drain.

fenceClimb.text: You climb the fence and land in someone's backyard. A raccoon stares at you from a tree branch, holding your beans mockingly.

moreClues.text: You find a tiny map drawn in crayon. It seems to show a raccoon hideout beneath the old playground.

fightOutcome.text: After a flurry of fur and fists, you stand victorious. The raccoon bows. 'You have earned your beans.'

choices.label: Take your beans and go home

forgetPath.text: You have forgotten your way home.

dropBeans.text: You trip over a piece of bread on the ground, and drop the jar of beans. You watch your beloved beans scatter across the dirt.

fakeBeans.text: You taste the beans. They taste like wax. These aren't your beans at all.

joinSyndicate.text: You kneel. 'Teach me your ways.' The raccoon nods. 'Welcome, Beanling.'

bureauIntro.text: You arrive at the Bureau of Legumes & Lost Goods. A tired detective looks up. 'Another bean theft?'

choices.label: Ask to see the bean database

fileReport.text: You fill out 47 pages of paperwork. The detective stamps it. 'We’ll get back to you in 6–8 months.'

waitLong.text: ENDING: After 50 years without your beans, you get a phone call. The detective tells you that he will find your beans. Before you can respond, your fake teeth fall out of your mouth by accident, and you end up telling him absolute gibberish. The detective is offended, and hangs up.

beanDatabase.text: The detective sighs. 'Fine.' He opens a massive file labeled BEAN CRIMES.

bureauRaccoon.text: The file is huge. The raccoon syndicate has been active for years.

bureauNeighbor.text: Your neighbor has 14 prior bean‑related incidents. Interesting.

endingVictory.text: ENDING: You defeated the raccoon and reclaimed your beans. You are now a legend.

endingHalfBeans.text: ENDING: You got half your beans back. Not perfect, but acceptable.

endingSyndicate.text: ENDING: You join the raccoon syndicate. You rise through the ranks. You become the Bean King.

endingCoward.text: ENDING: You ran away. The beans remain lost. The shame is eternal.

endingCry.text: ENDING: You sit down and cry. The forest watches silently.

endingGiveUp.text: ENDING: You give up entirely. The beans are gone forever.

endingCompensation.text: ENDING: Your neighbor gives you $3 as compensation. You buy new beans. Life goes on.

endingQuest.text: ENDING: You embark on a new quest to gather granola bars. The saga continues.

powPow.text: ENDING: Your neighbor knows karate, and punches you in the face. You run away, and trip over a lawn gnome. You forget about your beans, and decide to never throw pieces of bread at your neighbor again.

chessChallenge.text: A mysterious old man steps out of the bushes. 'Solve your bean problem? Beat me in chess.'

choices.label: Ask him if he knows how to meditate because old people do that a lot

oldManMeditate.text: 'Er, yes, I do meditate. Would you like to learn?' The old man asks calmly.

choices.label: Politely decline and go back to the chess challenge

chessPlay.text: You sit at a stone table. The old man moves a pawn. Your beans depend on this.

chessLore.text: 'Raccoons? No. They prefer checkers,' the old man says. 'Weak creatures.'

choices.label: Go find raccoons who play checkers

endingChessMaster.text: ENDING: You win flawlessly. The old man bows. 'You are the Bean Grandmaster now.'

endingChessFail.text: ENDING: You lose in four moves. The old man laughs for 17 minutes straight.

endingPawnEater.text: ENDING: You eat a pawn. It tastes like regret. The old man faints.

breakReality.text: You poke the air. A crack forms in reality. Light leaks out.

voidEntrance.text: You enter the Void. A giant cosmic bean floats before you.

cosmicBeanTalk.text: The cosmic bean whispers: 'Your beans were never stolen. They transcended.'

realityShatter.text: Reality collapses. You float in a swirling storm of raccoons, beans, and unpaid taxes.

rebuildReality.text: You rebuild reality, but accidentally make raccoons the dominant species.

choices.label: Bow to your new raccoon overlords

endingAscension.text: ENDING: You eat the cosmic bean and ascend to a higher plane. You become Bean Itself.

endingTranscend.text: ENDING: You transcend physical form. Your beans transcend with you. Perfect harmony.

endingShattered.text: ENDING: Reality shatters like glass. You drift forever in the Beanstorm.

endingOverlords.text: ENDING: Raccoons rule the universe. You are appointed Royal Bean Advisor.

metaAwareness.text: You suddenly realize you're in a game. The text feels... scripted.

choices.label: Delete the game from inside the game

findNarrator.text: You look up. A giant floating cursor hovers above you.

cursorTalk.text: The cursor says: 'Stop breaking the fourth wall. I'm busy.'

escapeGame.text: You run toward the edge of the screen. The world glitches.

endingDelete.text: ENDING: You delete the game from within the game. Everything stops existing. Including you.

endingCursorAngry.text: ENDING: The cursor becomes angry and drags you into the settings menu forever.

endingFifthWall.text: ENDING: You break the fifth wall. Nobody knows what that means. You win by default.

endingEscape.text: ENDING: You escape the game and appear on someone's desktop. They scream.

beanMagic.text: You discover an ancient spellbook titled 'Legumancy for Beginners'.

castSpell.text: You cast BEANUS MAXIMUS. Something happens.

beanFamiliar.text: A tiny bean with legs appears. It salutes you.

endingWizard.text: ENDING: You become a Bean Wizard. Your power is immeasurable.

endingExplosion.text: ENDING: The spell explodes. You are now slightly toasted.

endingFamiliar.text: ENDING: You and your bean familiar go on adventures forever.

endingEatFamiliar.text: ENDING: You eat your bean familiar. It was crunchy. You monster.

inventoryTest.text: You find a strange glowing bean shard on a pedestal.

lockedDoor.text: A massive stone door blocks your path. A bean-shaped indentation glows faintly.

choices.label: Push the door with your bare hands

doorOpens.text: The shard fits perfectly. The door rumbles open, revealing a hidden chamber.

skillTreeIntro.text: A glowing mural depicts ancient bean techniques. You feel knowledge flowing into you.

skillUnlocked.text: You feel a new power awaken within you.

loreIntro.text: Ancient carvings line the walls. They depict the history of the Bean War.

loreSaved.text: You jot down the carvings into your Beanpedia.

mapIntro.text: A stone map appears on the wall, showing several locations.

choices.label: Unlock the Ancient Chamber on your map

mapSaved.text: The map glows. You feel the location imprint itself into your mind.

chaosIntro.text: The air crackles. Something chaotic stirs.

chaosEvent.text: CHAOS MODE: Reality begins to distort. Raccoons fall from the ceiling. Beans float upward.

miniGameIntro.text: A glowing puzzle appears before you. Solve it to restore balance.

longJourneyStart.text: You feel a strange tug in your soul. A whisper: 'Your beans are not lost... only far away.'

beanSpirit.text: A translucent bean spirit appears. 'You seek the True Beans. Few survive the journey.'

beanSpiritLore.text: 'I died in the Great Bean War of 1987,' it says. 'Long story.'

beanTrial1.text: TRIAL 1: You must cross the Bridge of Mild Inconvenience. A sign reads: 'Bridge closed for repairs.'

beanTrial2.text: TRIAL 2: A raccoon monk blocks your path. 'Solve my riddle: What has beans but is not a bean?'

choices.label: A raccoon with a tiny backpack

beanTrial3.text: TRIAL 3: You enter a chamber with three doors: PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE.

timePast.text: You arrive at your house yesterday. You see yourself eating beans at 2 AM.

timePresent.text: You step into the present. Nothing happens. Time is boring.

timeFuture.text: You see a future where raccoons rule the world. They salute you.

beanTrial4.text: FINAL TRIAL: A giant stone door reads: 'ONLY THE BEAN-WORTHY MAY ENTER.'

beanGuardian.text: A massive guardian made of beans awakens. 'STATE YOUR PURPOSE.'

guardianTest.text: 'ANSWER THIS: What is the true nature of beans?'

choices.label: A metaphor for the journey we take within ourselves

beanSanctum.text: The guardian bows. The door opens. Inside lies a glowing pedestal.

trueBeansReveal.text: On the pedestal sits a jar. YOUR jar. Untouched. Perfect. Radiating bean energy.

trueEnding.text: TRUE ENDING: After countless trials, timelines, raccoons, spirits, and cosmic nonsense... you finally reclaim your beans. They are warm. They are perfect. You have won.

endingEatDirt.text: ENDING: You eat dirt. It tastes like dirt. You learn nothing.

endingLongStory.text: ENDING: The bean spirit tells a 9-hour story. You die of boredom.

endingPatience.text: ENDING: You wait 47 years. The bridge never opens.

endingWrongRiddle.text: ENDING: The raccoon monk shakes his head. 'Incorrect.' He bonks you with a stick.

endingRaccoonOffended.text: ENDING: The raccoon monk is offended. He calls his lawyer.

endingParadox.text: ENDING: You warn past-you. Past-you panics. Time collapses.

endingSelfTheft.text: ENDING: You steal your own beans. You create the very problem you tried to solve.

endingFootPain.text: ENDING: You kick the stone door. You break your foot. The door does not care.

endingEnlightenment.text: ENDING: You transcend beans. You become pure legume energy.

endingUnworthy.text: ENDING: The guardian deems you unworthy. You are bean-blasted into the forest.

endingHesitate.text: ENDING: You hesitate for too long. A raccoon steals the jar.

longJourneySidePath.text: A second whisper calls to you. 'The long journey has many roads. Choose unwisely.'

leftWhisper.text: You walk left and immediately fall into a bean pit. Thousands of beans stare at you.

beanStare.text: The beans blink in unison. You feel judged.

dominanceAttempt.text: You puff your chest. The beans puff back. You are outnumbered.

choices.label: Challenge the beans to a duel

beanDuel.text: A single bean rolls forward. It is the champion.

beanSwim.text: You swim through the beans like a majestic dolphin. A bean dolphin.

choices.label: Stop and reflect on your life choices

beanOcean.text: The pit expands into an ocean of beans. A pirate ship approaches.

beanPirates.text: The Bean Pirates welcome you aboard. Their captain is a giant bean with an eyepatch.

beanCrew.text: You become a bean pirate. Your first task: steal beans from other pirates.

beanMutiny.text: You attempt a mutiny. The beans are not impressed.

rightWhisper.text: You follow the right whisper and find a glowing vending machine.

vendingSnack.text: You press a button. The machine dispenses a single bean.

beanSaved.text: The bean glows. It whispers: 'I am the Key Bean.'

keyBeanLore.text: 'I unlock the path to the True Beans... but only if you prove worthy.'

worthinessTest.text: The Key Bean asks: 'What is the opposite of beans?'

choices.label: There is no opposite. Beans simply are.

keyBeanOpens.text: The Key Bean glows brightly. A portal opens.

portalRealm.text: You enter a realm made entirely of bean energy. A cosmic figure approaches.

cosmicFigure.text: The figure says: 'I am the Bean Architect. I designed your suffering.'

architectWhy.text: 'Because it is funny,' the Architect says.

architectAccept.text: The Architect nods. 'Then you are ready for the True Beans.'

vendingInside.text: You crawl inside the vending machine. It is bigger on the inside.

vendingWorld.text: You discover a tiny civilization of vending machine people.

backWhisper.text: You turn around and walk backward into a mysterious elevator.

elevatorChaos.text: The elevator descends for 14 hours. Music plays. You lose track of time.

elevatorBreak.text: You break the elevator. It plummets into the Bean Underworld.

beanUnderworld.text: You meet the Bean Reaper. He looks tired.

reaperDeal.text: 'I can return your beans... for a price.'

reaperPrice.text: 'Bring me the Soul of a Raccoon.'

raccoonSoulQuest.text: You must now hunt the raccoon who stole your beans.

raccoonTrack.text: You find the raccoon meditating under a waterfall.

endingBlink.text: ENDING: You blink. The beans blink. You die of awkwardness.

endingRetreatBeans.text: ENDING: You retreat. The beans gossip about you.

endingBeanDefeat.text: ENDING: The bean defeats you. Embarrassing.

endingBeanMercy.text: ENDING: You lose intentionally. The beans respect your humility.

endingReflection.text: ENDING: You reflect too hard and implode.

endingDrownBeans.text: ENDING: You drown in beans. A strange way to go.

endingPirateLife.text: ENDING: You live as a bean pirate forever.

endingWalkPlank.text: ENDING: You walk the plank into bean-infested waters.

endingMutinyApology.text: ENDING: You apologize. The beans forgive you.

endingVendingKick.text: ENDING: You kick the machine. It kicks back.

endingCursedBean.text: ENDING: The bean curses you. You turn into a bean.

endingThrowKeyBean.text: ENDING: You throw the Key Bean. It cries.

endingEatKeyBean.text: ENDING: You eat the Key Bean. You explode.

endingRunPortal.text: ENDING: You run. The portal judges you.

endingPunchArchitect.text: ENDING: You punch the Architect. He deletes you.

endingStuck.text: ENDING: You get stuck inside the vending machine forever.

endingVendingKing.text: ENDING: You become king of the vending people.

endingVendingWar.text: ENDING: You declare war. You lose instantly.

endingAllButtons.text: ENDING: You press all the buttons. The elevator screams.

endingElevatorWait.text: ENDING: You wait 200 years. The elevator never stops.

endingReaperFight.text: ENDING: You fight the Bean Reaper. He wins.

endingRefuseReaper.text: ENDING: You refuse. The Reaper shrugs and leaves.

endingSoulSteal.text: ENDING: You steal the raccoon's soul. You monster.

endingRaccoonRefuses.text: ENDING: The raccoon refuses. You respect its boundaries.

forestMeditation.text: You sit on a mossy rock and meditate. The forest hums. Something ancient stirs.

endingIgnoreForest.text: ENDING: You ignore the ancient forest whisper. It ignores you back. Mutual disappointment.

bureauBasement.text: A detective whispers: 'If you really want answers… check the basement.'

basementDoor.text: The basement door is covered in warning signs. One reads: 'BEAN PROPHECY STORAGE.'

endingBasementKnock.text: ENDING: You knock. Something knocks back. You flee instantly.

prophecyRoom.text: Scrolls float in the air. A glowing one drifts toward you.

endingEatScroll.text: ENDING: You eat the prophecy scroll. It tastes like destiny and paper.

prophecyRead.text: The scroll reads: 'THE ONE WHO SEEKS THE TRUE BEANS MUST WALK THE LONG ROAD.'

endingRejectDestiny.text: ENDING: You reject destiny. Destiny shrugs and leaves.

raccoonMeditation.text: The raccoon bandit pauses mid‑fight. 'Wait… do you hear that?'

endingNoListen.text: ENDING: You say no. The raccoon is offended and leaves.

breakRealityDeep.text: The crack in reality widens. You glimpse a distant road stretching into infinity.

forestStoolInspect.text: You inspect the weird stool thingy. It vibrates softly.

endingStoolKick.text: ENDING: You kick the stool. It screams. You run.

stoolSit.text: You sit. The stool sinks into the ground, taking you with it.

endingStoolTrap.text: ENDING: You try to escape. The stool holds you tighter. You live there now.

neighborWeirdAttic.text: Your neighbor whispers: 'If you really want answers… check my attic.'

atticStart.text: The attic is filled with bean‑shaped relics. One glows faintly.

atticRelic.text: The relic pulses. A voice whispers: 'Walk the long path…'

endingIgnoreRelic.text: ENDING: You ignore the relic. It explodes out of spite.

bureauSecretHallway.text: A hidden hallway opens behind a filing cabinet. A sign reads: 'BEAN QUEST INITIATION.'

hallwayEnter.text: The hallway stretches impossibly far. You hear chanting.

forestDeepHole.text: You find a deep hole in the forest. A sign reads: 'BEAN TRIALS BELOW.'

endingRockThrow.text: ENDING: You throw a rock. Something throws it back harder.

cosmicBeanEcho.text: A faint echo of the cosmic bean calls to you from beyond reality.

endingHangUp.text: ENDING: You hang up on a cosmic bean. It blocks your number.

beanCultEncounter.text: A hooded figure approaches you in the forest. 'Do you seek… the Bean Truth?'

beanCultChamber.text: You are led into a hidden underground chamber. Dozens of robed figures chant 'BEAN! BEAN! BEAN!'

cultChant.text: You chant with them. The room vibrates. A glowing bean descends from the ceiling.

cultProphecy.text: The cult leader whispers: 'Only the Long Journey reveals the True Beans.'

endingCultRefusal.text: ENDING: You refuse the cult. They hiss and vanish into the bushes.

endingCultSnacks.text: ENDING: They offer you a stale granola bar. You regret asking.

endingCultBow.text: ENDING: You bow. The glowing bean falls on your head.

endingCultReject.text: ENDING: You reject the cult. They curse your future bean harvest.

beanCasinoEntrance.text: You stumble upon a neon sign: 'BEAN CASINO — ALL OR NOTHING.'

beanCasino.text: Inside, raccoons in tuxedos run slot machines. A dealer bean waves you over.

casinoBlackjack.text: You sit at a table. The dealer bean deals you two cards: 7 and BEAN.

endingBlackjackBust.text: ENDING: You bust. The dealer bean laughs at you.

endingBlackjackWin.text: ENDING: You win! Your prize is a coupon for 10% off beans.

casinoSlots.text: You pull the lever. The slots spin: BEAN — BEAN — ???

endingSlotsLose.text: ENDING: The third slot is a raccoon. You lose everything.

endingSlotsKick.text: ENDING: You kick the machine. It explodes into beans.

casinoVIP.text: The VIP room is guarded by a bean bouncer. He scans you.

choices.label: Tell him you seek the Long Journey

endingVIPBribe.text: ENDING: You bribe him with a granola bar. He eats it and denies you anyway.

beanCourtroom.text: You are summoned to Bean Court. A judge bean bangs a tiny gavel.

endingCourtGuilty.text: ENDING: You plead guilty. You are sentenced to 30 years of bean sorting.

courtInnocent.text: The judge bean narrows its eyes. 'Prove it.'

courtEvidence.text: You present a single bean shell as evidence.

endingCourtRun.text: ENDING: You run. The bean bailiffs chase you.

endingCourtCursed.text: ENDING: The courtroom panics. Everyone flees.

beanTrainStation.text: A train station appears where it definitely wasn’t before. A sign reads: 'BEAN EXPRESS — DESTINY LINE.'

beanTrain.text: You board the train. The conductor bean tips its hat.

trainDestination.text: 'This train only goes one place,' the conductor says. 'The Long Journey.'

endingTrainQuiet.text: ENDING: You sit quietly. The train never stops.

endingTrainJump.text: ENDING: You jump off and land in a bush. A raccoon laughs at you.

beanPopeEncounter.text: A holy bean wearing a tall hat approaches. 'My child… your journey is long.'

popeBlessing.text: The Bean Pope blesses you. You feel warm and slightly seasoned.

endingPopeGreedy.text: ENDING: You ask for beans. The Bean Pope sighs and walks away.

endingPopeReject.text: ENDING: You reject the blessing. Lightning strikes a nearby tree.
